title: OWN PLACE COOL GUY HERE WANTING TO MEET A GIRL, HANGOUT N CHILL 420
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Hey I am on here just looking for 1 cool girl for a fwb to spend some time with. I am uni educated, mature with my own place. I have plenty of entertainment. I am looking for a girl that is attractive and young to hangout with. I like watching movies, going out, drinking and 420. Sti free and very clean. Looking for a girl that is same. Prefer a girl that is down to earth laidback and looking for a good time. Please send pics if you wanna meet up. No pressure we can meet outside first. Pics 4 pic please and I am easy on the eyes some people say I am handsome :)

Well Thank u
